title: Client doesnt start up after i closed the Game [CLIENT CRASH]
body:
It happened rarely the last few months, but now suddenly it startet to happen more frequent. When i played a round of lol, the client wont start up again. After clicking "Victory/Defeat" the game closes but i suddenly find myself on my desktop, with no trace of any lol client running.
If this happens, i have to relaunch lol and login in again. I miss out on all the fun in the post game screen, cant report or honor players and cannot watch all those fancy grids and graphs.
I cant reproduce it at will, it just happens sometimes.

replies.body: I know you've gone through a few steps which is great, but it's really important to go through each step to rule out possibilities.  If the issue persists then grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs and reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you individually to investigate your specific issue further.  We'll reply back to your ticket as soon as we can.

Unless you have any third party programs interacting with league, it sounds like you might have a security setting that's closing the client or blocking you from transitioning to it post-game.  You should run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot as well as review settings you might have on your firewall or anti-virus systems.  Let me know if you have any questions!

It isnt anyone of those permissions. Its installed as Admin, and always executet as Admin. Lol is trustet on my firewall as well as on my norton security.  Hard drive is regularly scanned and UAC is activatet but so far has never promptet me on something Leage wants todo. As im using W10, im fairly sure its always up to date, and if not its updating itself forcefully no matter what i want.
This has been a ongoing issue for a few months.
